author: stahlleiton
body:
#### PR description:

Partial backport of  https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/49227 
This PR backports the PbPb EW skim to be used for central PbPb skim production of 2023 and 2024 PbPb data.

To be tested with relvals 141.201,141.202

@mandrenguyen
title: [13_2_X] Backport of PbPb EW skim
